column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Brett - Thank you very much for the awesome
column2: comprehensive review. I'm glad you enjoyed our ramen and that you received good service while you were here. Every day we are learning a new lesson in running our business
column3: and trying to find the optimal method for seating an influx of guests is one of our top priorities. In short
column5: but we try our best. Thank you for your constructive feedback
